alert.note: Alert for Northern Liberty; Polk (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 7:59PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Montgomery, San Jacinto, northwestern Liberty and southern Polk Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 758 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Shepherd, or near Cleveland, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Livingston, Shepherd, Cut And Shoot, Coldspring, Goodrich, North Cleveland, Seven Oaks, Lake Livingston State Park, Alabama-Coushatta Reservation, West Livingston, Leggett, Segno, Romayor, Evergreen and Rye. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
